Is this... the end...\""},{"lineNumber":157148,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵は地に腰を突き、","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldier sank to the ground,"},{"lineNumber":157149,"originalJapaneseLine":"眼前にはハウゼルの武器が突きつけられていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"with Howzel’s weapon pointed directly at him."},{"lineNumber":157150,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……魔人を相手に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Against a demon,"},{"lineNumber":157151,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よく保たせた方かと」","translatedEnglishLine":"I think you held out quite well.\""},{"lineNumber":157152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ははは、結界関係なしに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, regardless of the barrier,"},{"lineNumber":157153,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一太刀も入れられなかったがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I couldn’t land a single blow.\""},{"lineNumber":157154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、殺してくれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, kill me."},{"lineNumber":157155,"originalJapaneseLine":"　覚悟は出来ている」","translatedEnglishLine":"I am ready.\""},{"lineNumber":157156,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その必要は……ありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No need for that..."},{"lineNumber":157157,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう決着はつきました」","translatedEnglishLine":"The outcome has already been decided.\""},{"lineNumber":157158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰か、火傷は軽いものです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone, the burns are minor."},{"lineNumber":157159,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに手当をしてあげてください」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please tend to them immediately.\""},{"lineNumber":157160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふほほっ……優しい天女様よ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuhuhu... Kind heavenly maiden..."},{"lineNumber":157161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　惨めな生、ありがたく頂戴いたす」","translatedEnglishLine":"I gratefully accept this miserable life.\""},{"lineNumber":157162,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":157163,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵が肩を借りながら去るのを見届け、","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching the soldier leave leaning on a shoulder,"},{"lineNumber":157164,"originalJapaneseLine":"息をつきながらハウゼルは武器を下ろした。","translatedEnglishLine":"Howzel lowered his weapon with a sigh."},{"lineNumber":157165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……人間には変わった方がいるのね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew... There sure are strange people among humans...\""},{"lineNumber":157166,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあああ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now then!"},{"lineNumber":157167,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次は我が輩の番だあああああ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's my turn now!\""},{"lineNumber":157168,"originalJapaneseLine":"ヘルマン人と見まごうような","translatedEnglishLine":"A huge man resembling a Germanic warrior,"},{"lineNumber":157169,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨漢の男が巨大な剣を振りながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"wielding a giant sword,"},{"lineNumber":157170,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルに向けて歩を進める。","translatedEnglishLine":"advanced towards Howzel."},{"lineNumber":157171,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……貴方も、死ぬのを覚悟して、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You too, prepared to die,"},{"lineNumber":157172,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私と戦うんですね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"are going to fight me, right?\""},{"lineNumber":157173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「無論！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course!\""},{"lineNumber":157174,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むしろ、こんな美しい天使に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rather, if I can have such a beautiful angel"},{"lineNumber":157175,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死に様を看取ってもらえるなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"watch over my death,"},{"lineNumber":157176,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こちらからお願いしたいくらいよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’d even ask for that!\""},{"lineNumber":157177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":157178,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こ、こほん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ahem.\""},{"lineNumber":157179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行きますよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here I go!\""},{"lineNumber":157180,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルが宙を滑空し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Howzel glided through the air,"},{"lineNumber":157181,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵に向けて突っ込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and charged at the Leazas soldiers."},{"lineNumber":157182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんだこの状況……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is this situation...\""},{"lineNumber":157183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、いいのかこれ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, is this okay?"},{"lineNumber":157184,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決闘なんて呑気な真似……」","translatedEnglishLine":"A duel in times like this...?"},{"lineNumber":157185,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、だが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, but..."},{"lineNumber":157186,"originalJapaneseLine":"　赤軍のエリート騎士様だぜ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"He’s an elite knight of the Red Army, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":157187,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……赤軍は死にたがりが多すぎる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah... The Red Army has too many who want to die.\""},{"lineNumber":157188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうされますか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":157189,"originalJapaneseLine":"この地域を担当していた、","translatedEnglishLine":"The veteran of the White Army in charge of this area,"},{"lineNumber":157190,"originalJapaneseLine":"白軍の老兵は唸った。","translatedEnglishLine":"grunted thoughtfully."},{"lineNumber":157191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、むしろ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, rather..."},{"lineNumber":157192,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良い手かも知れんぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"This might actually be a good move.\""},{"lineNumber":157193,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":157194,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":157195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew..."},{"lineNumber":157196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆、すごい気迫ね……","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone has incredible fighting spirit..."},{"lineNumber":157197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　押されてしまいそう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like I’m about to be pushed back...\""},{"lineNumber":157198,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後も何人ものリーザス兵と戦い、","translatedEnglishLine":"After fighting many more Leazas soldiers,"},{"lineNumber":157199,"originalJapaneseLine":"一時休憩に魔軍陣地に戻ったハウゼルは","translatedEnglishLine":"Howzel returned to the demon army base for a temporary rest,"},{"lineNumber":157200,"originalJapaneseLine":"疲れこそないものの溜め息を吐いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and sighed, though not feeling tired."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルは武器を構える以外になかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzel had no choice but to raise his weapon.
The soldier sank to the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼前にはハウゼルの武器が突きつけられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with Howzel’s weapon pointed directly at him.
I think you held out quite well."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一太刀も入れられなかったがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn’t land a single blow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう決着はつきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The outcome has already been decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに手当をしてあげてください」
惨めな生、ありがたく頂戴いたす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I gratefully accept this miserable life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵が肩を借りながら去るのを見届け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching the soldier leave leaning on a shoulder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 息をつきながらハウゼルは武器を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzel lowered his weapon with a sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう……人間には変わった方がいるのね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... There sure are strange people among humans..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次は我が輩の番だあああああ！」
ヘルマン人と見まごうような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge man resembling a Germanic warrior,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨漢の男が巨大な剣を振りながら、
ハウゼルに向けて歩を進める。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are going to fight me, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むしろ、こんな美しい天使に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather, if I can have such a beautiful angel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死に様を看取ってもらえるなら、
こちらからお願いしたいくらいよ！」
ハウゼルが宙を滑空し、
リーザス兵に向けて突っ込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and charged at the Leazas soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決闘なんて呑気な真似……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A duel in times like this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤軍のエリート騎士様だぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s an elite knight of the Red Army, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……赤軍は死にたがりが多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... The Red Army has too many who want to die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地域を担当していた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The veteran of the White Army in charge of this area,
This might actually be a good move."
I feel like I’m about to be pushed back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後も何人ものリーザス兵と戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After fighting many more Leazas soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時休憩に魔軍陣地に戻ったハウゼルは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzel returned to the demon army base for a temporary rest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲れこそないものの溜め息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and sighed, though not feeling tired.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルは武器を構える以外になかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzel had no choice but to raise his weapon.
The soldier sank to the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眼前にはハウゼルの武器が突きつけられていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: with Howzel’s weapon pointed directly at him.
I think you held out quite well."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I couldn’t land a single blow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう決着はつきました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The outcome has already been decided."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに手当をしてあげてください」
惨めな生、ありがたく頂戴いたす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I gratefully accept this miserable life."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵が肩を借りながら去るのを見届け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Watching the soldier leave leaning on a shoulder,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 息をつきながらハウゼルは武器を下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzel lowered his weapon with a sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふう……人間には変わった方がいるのね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew... There sure are strange people among humans..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次は我が輩の番だあああああ！」
ヘルマン人と見まごうような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A huge man resembling a Germanic warrior,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨漢の男が巨大な剣を振りながら、
ハウゼルに向けて歩を進める。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are going to fight me, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「むしろ、こんな美しい天使に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rather, if I can have such a beautiful angel

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死に様を看取ってもらえるなら、
こちらからお願いしたいくらいよ！」
ハウゼルが宙を滑空し、
リーザス兵に向けて突っ込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and charged at the Leazas soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決闘なんて呑気な真似……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A duel in times like this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤軍のエリート騎士様だぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He’s an elite knight of the Red Army, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はあ……赤軍は死にたがりが多すぎる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hah... The Red Army has too many who want to die."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この地域を担当していた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The veteran of the White Army in charge of this area,
This might actually be a good move."
I feel like I’m about to be pushed back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後も何人ものリーザス兵と戦い、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After fighting many more Leazas soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一時休憩に魔軍陣地に戻ったハウゼルは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howzel returned to the demon army base for a temporary rest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 疲れこそないものの溜め息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and sighed, though not feeling tired.
